text:
[Verse]
Sunny skies above us now
By the water we play
Songs of laughter fill the air
Skipping stones all day

[Verse 2]
Moments we will treasure
As the sun starts to fade
Echoes in the distance
Making memories made

[Chorus]
Skipping stones skipping hearts
Throwing dreams across the water
Hold my hand let's make a start
We belong here every summer

[Verse 3]
Gentle breeze and shouting loud
Ripples run away
Footprints on the sandy ground
Wishing we could stay

[Chorus]
Skipping stones skipping hearts
Throwing dreams across the water
Hold my hand let's make a start
We belong here every summer

[Bridge]
Timeless days and nights of gold
Smiles that never fall
In this place our stories told
Answering the call
title: Skipping Stones
